channel.title: My Website, Please tell me what you think about it
channel.description:
I posted my website www.upload-fast.com, right here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,274475.msg2246203.html#msg2246203]a long time ago[/url]. The users here gave some great reviews of what I should implement and work on. I have just gotten around to the website and made some major and minor changes which are below:
Major Changes:
-Changed Entire layout:logo, colors, buttons, rounded corners -Removed amounts of ads by 1/3 -Added some dynamic content -Added entire database-less landing page. For example, if I upload http://upload-fast.com/files/52316a88a6456945c75123eea0939dd0.jpg, embed in the hyper link, will be the link to a landing page on which you can find more details about the picture. You'll be able to see the landing page in http://upload-fast.com/?url=52316a88a6456945c75123eea0939dd0.jpg. Check it out right now.
Small Changes:
-Added better ToS -Added a better spam proof contact form
In your opinion, what would be another great feature to add? Remember, there is not going to be any user accounts here or anything database related.
The whole point of the website is to allow fast uploads. Please help me by reviewing my website.

item.title: My Website, Please tell me what you think about it
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“crazyhelper, post:3, topic:232067”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=305704.msg2449579#msg2449579 date=1221894104]
Horray! Another one of these. Except I accept all file types and high file sizes.
[/quote]
Oh, this one is just for images. Wait up until I release my “real” file hosting website. I got a six letter domain, everything is in AJAX.I don’t want to give out more details because I’m not done yet. You will be amazed.[/quote]If I wasn’t lazy, you’d be amazed too

Read full topic
item.source: My Website, Please tell me what you think about it

@crazyhelper wrote:

I posted my website www.upload-fast.com, right here a long time ago. The users here gave some great reviews of what I should implement and work on. I have just gotten around to the website and made some major and minor changes which are below:

Major Changes:

-Changed Entire layout:logo, colors, buttons, rounded corners
-Removed amounts of ads by 1/3
-Added some dynamic content
-Added entire database-less landing page. For example, if I upload http://upload-fast.com/files/52316a88a6456945c75123eea0939dd0.jpg, embed in the hyper link, will be the link to a landing page on which you can find more details about the picture. You’ll be able to see the landing page in http://upload-fast.com/?url=52316a88a6456945c75123eea0939dd0.jpg. Check it out right now.

Small Changes:

-Added better ToS
-Added a better spam proof contact form

In your opinion, what would be another great feature to add? Remember, there is not going to be any user accounts here or anything database related.

The whole point of the website is to allow fast uploads. Please help me by reviewing my website.
